name: Unclimbable Tower
description:
In a unique low-poly environment, you have to climb towers using your only tools: your hands and some pointless objects lying around the map.

The game is still in very early development, you might experience a lot of bugs and missing features. Feedback is always welcomed!

All props are custom made in blender and objects were textured using custom shader that I made. Some assets from the Unity Asset Store were also used in this project:

1. Footsteps - Essentials by Nox_Sound: (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/footsteps-essentials-..)

2. Customizable skybox by Key Mouse: (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/footsteps-essentials-..)

3. Lowpoly Textures Pack by N-hance Studio:

(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/lowpoly-textures-pac...)

Music by ROVADOR on Soundcloud: (https://soundcloud.com/rovadormusic/inspiring-landscape-background-musicemotiona...)
